channel.title: [PI] Whip Special
channel.description:
Hello there,
My whip special on my server does not seem to work. It uses 50% of the special bar and there is a delay where an animation should be played and damaged applied but it doesn't happen. My character just sits there for the duration of a whip attack with no animation or gfx.
Can anyone help? :)
ps. I've searched through my files for 4151 and no special code has come up.

item.title: [PI] Whip Special
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

You need the animation for the whip. Perhaps you should try upgraded your cache.

Read full topic
